examples.text: Mr. <w>Spangler</w> has been teaching history at the high school for over twenty years.
The <w>Spangler</w> family is well known in the community for their charitable work.

senses.sense_definition: A person or device that decorates items with small, sparkling objects known as spangles.

examples.text: The costume designer worked as a <w>spangler</w> to add glitter to the dancers' outfits.
She is a skilled <w>spangler</w>, carefully attaching sequins to the evening gown by hand.
